channel.title: Nemesis-X | ALL Skills Working| Minigames |Extreme Content |
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://nemesis-x.com/images/redfox/misc/logo.gif[/img]
Hello and welcome to Nemesis-X! (Pictures are being added right now!)
Fourms: [url=http://www.nemesis-x.com]Nemesis-X[/url]
Client Download: [url=http://nemesis-x.com/forumdisplay.php?2-Play]Play[/url]
[center]--Features--[/center]
[left]Bank with banktabs 23 Fully working skills PKP Shop Vote for reward Vote point shop Prestigeing for points Prestige shop Glacors Jadinkos Quests 600+ Items Strykewyrm Quest Lunar Diplomacy Quest Desert Treasure Quest Duel Arena Fight Pits Fight Caves Pest Control Barrows Zombie Minigame Save teleports with naming Slayer system Boss tasks Corporeal Beast Nex Charming Imp All chaotics working PvP Armours and weapons Achievement System Max cape miniquest Completionist cape with requirements Clanchat Dicing Mithril seeds (Planting flowers) Well thought out economy 2 Starters per IP Plenty of shops for the starter X2 XP WEEKENDS Auto Donation System Skilling Tasks Skilling Point Shop Skilling Area Donators only area Donators only slayer dungeon Vanguard Website Highscores (With Signatures) PKing with PK points and Killstreaks Loyalty Points Ape Atoll with agressive monkey archers and monkey guards XP Modes (Disabled but can easily be enabled!) Membership system (30 Days) (Disabled but can easily be enabled) Custom Area with clientsided objects (Veery few lines) Tab to reply Zoom in and out (F11 - F12) Keys Duo Slayer System And Much Much more. [/left]
[center][SIZE=5]--Media--[/SIZE][/center]
[IMG]http://oi60.tinypic.com/233djo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/259l6i1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rtO68Vt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kln6LDQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NNHou3k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3FKs552.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j1EeGz6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ijZjhZt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XTci7kl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y2Jc94C.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/npxZJ1g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0j9eyoF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3qNhSoJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pf2UtdD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yoqSVdb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xHVaMUT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N2grMRX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3kA587G.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nTczGRO.png[/img]

Hope to see you online:) It’s a new server so yeah, We are working our way up.

item.description:
@rage_0wnz wrote:

[CENTER]

Hello and welcome to Nemesis-X! (Pictures are being added right now!)

Fourms: Nemesis-X

Client Download: Play

[center]–Features–[/center]

[left]Bank with banktabs
23 Fully working skills
PKP Shop
Vote for reward
Vote point shop
Prestigeing for points
Prestige shop
Glacors
Jadinkos
Quests
600+ Items
Strykewyrm Quest
Lunar Diplomacy Quest
Desert Treasure Quest
Duel Arena
Fight Pits
Fight Caves
Pest Control
Barrows
Zombie Minigame
Save teleports with naming
Slayer system
Boss tasks
Corporeal Beast
Nex
Charming Imp
All chaotics working
PvP Armours and weapons
Achievement System
Max cape miniquest
Completionist cape with requirements
Clanchat
Dicing
Mithril seeds (Planting flowers)
Well thought out economy
2 Starters per IP
Plenty of shops for the starter
X2 XP WEEKENDS
Auto Donation System
Skilling Tasks
Skilling Point Shop
Skilling Area
Donators only area
Donators only slayer dungeon
Vanguard
Website Highscores (With Signatures)
PKing with PK points and Killstreaks
Loyalty Points
Ape Atoll with agressive monkey archers and monkey guards
XP Modes (Disabled but can easily be enabled!)
Membership system (30 Days) (Disabled but can easily be enabled)
Custom Area with clientsided objects (Veery few lines)
Tab to reply
Zoom in and out (F11 - F12) Keys
Duo Slayer System
And Much Much more.
[/left]
